subject: Dear Fowler, A; Khosmood, F: A Special Issue Intends to Draw Together Ideas on Health Care
body:
Special Issue: Cancer, Health Care Needs and Cancer Patients' Life Quality Lead Guest Editor: Gamze Temiz Affiliation: University of Health Sciences,Turkey Dear Fowler, A; Khosmood, F, Warmest greetings. With the joint efforts of the lead guest editor Gamze Temiz and other 4 guest editors, the special issue titled Cancer, Health Care Needs and Cancer Patients' Life Quality (http://www.crjournal.org/sinfo/158012/y8nE) has been proposed under Cancer Research Journal (http://www.crjournal.org/index/y8nE) . It is an open platform for researchers in the same field to spread their research achievements and accomplishments. They aim to gather together scholars in the same scientific community via the special issue, in order to exchange and disseminate their achievements and experience about Health Care. If you, as a member of the scientific community, have any new achievements in the field, be sure to share your insights and experiences with more academic peers. Your contribution will have particular value to the scientific community. Contribute Your Research Papers Novel insights and fundamental research around the following topics are welcome. Here are some of the topics of interest: 1. Symptom management 2. Quality of life 3. Education 1. Cancer patient 2. Unmet need 3. Chemotherapeutic drug application The submission deadline is February 20, 2020. Submission system: http://www.crjournal.org/submission/y8nE Any questions, please feel free to contact us. We're looking forward to your paper submission. Warmly, Amelia Ford


Special Issue: Cancer, Health Care Needs and Cancer Patients' Life Quality
Lead Guest Editor: Gamze Temiz
Affiliation: University of Health Sciences,Turkey
Dear Fowler, A; Khosmood, F,
Warmest greetings.
With the joint efforts of the lead guest editor Gamze Temiz and other 4 guest editors, the special issue titled Cancer, Health Care Needs and Cancer Patients' Life Quality (http://www.crjournal.org/sinfo/158012/y8nE) has been proposed under Cancer Research Journal (http://www.crjournal.org/index/y8nE). It is an open platform for researchers in the same field to spread their research achievements and accomplishments.
They aim to gather together scholars in the same scientific community via the special issue, in order to exchange and disseminate their achievements and experience about Health Care.
If you, as a member of the scientific community, have any new achievements in the field, be sure to share your insights and experiences with more academic peers. Your contribution will have particular value to the scientific community.
Contribute Your Research Papers
Novel insights and fundamental research around the following topics are welcome.
Here are some of the topics of interest:
  1. Symptom management
  2. Quality of life
  3. Education
  1. Cancer patient
  2. Unmet need
  3. Chemotherapeutic drug application
The submission deadline is February 20, 2020.
Submission system: http://www.crjournal.org/submission/y8nE
Any questions, please feel free to contact us.
We're looking forward to your paper submission.
Warmly,
Amelia Ford
